jaitools.jiffle.runtime
Class JiffleEventAdapter

java.lang.Object
  jaitools.jiffle.runtime.JiffleEventAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
JiffleEventListener
public class JiffleEventAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements JiffleEventListener

Convenience class that can be sub-classed when not all methods declared in the JiffleEventListener interface are required

Author:
Michael Bedward
